name: Edmond and The Fraudlent Ghost
description:
Edmond is a bailiff coming to seize a haunted mansion. A ghost will try to stop him but he moves only if the light is on or if Edmond hits some stuff and makes noise. Edmond can switch the light at will to escape from the ghost.

To move use the arrow keys.
To switch the light use Q or A (azerty).
